About

Hello there, stranger!

My name is Yuriy Romadin and I’m a web developer.

Right now

Currently I’m a team lead at Sellfy.com - online service that allows you to create your e-commerce store under 5-minutes and start selling products directly to your audience through website or social media.

Before

Worked on various online projects as a freelancer and created a couple of commercial Wordpress themes.
